page.title: 20A TEENAGE LOOK AT"THE STREET
page.content:
"The Street"Willesborough is like an English village.It has a variety of houses-Tudor,Georgian,cottages,modern bungalows,unique,and estate types. It is a good place to live because of its surroundings-the Harvey Hospital for emergencies for example! There is one snag about living here- the shops are 20minutes walk away.We have a bus every hour to Ashford and the coast.It is usually on time! There isn't alot to do here,but we can go to the play park or Broomfields. "The Street"is very picturesque and I prefer living here to any other village or estate.My house is shown on Photo D.
BLOCK 06040141 was researched,photo- graphed and compiled during June and July 1985 by the T2 Geography Group and Miss Barbara Wadie of North Girls' School, Ashford, KENT.
